properties.name: Taft Theatre: Jon Stewart
properties.description: Posted by Nevcrack  317 East Fifth Street, Cincinnati, OHBrian, Kerry, and I saw Jon Stewart perform standup on October 18, 2002. We went around to the sid of the building to see if we could get his autograph. He was there and I handed him the only thing I had (a surprisingly appropriate ticket stub to "Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back"): Stewart: These just keep getting smaller and smaller. "Here, could you sign this gum wrapper I found on the ground."

properties.name: Wellington Pharmacy: Willem Dafoe
properties.description: Posted by Nevcrack 39 Knightsbridge, London, SW1X 7NL, United KingdomThis is where Brian, Meg, and I saw Willem Dafoe buying a tooth brush on July 28, 2003. Brian said a guy looking at tooth brushes looked like the dude from Boondock Saints. Meg and I looked and confirmed the sighting. After debating whether to approach him, I did so as he left: Me: Excuse me, sir. I enjoyed your work on "The Raven." Dafoe: Thank you.
